title: Unrestricted Public Access to PHI Data Bucket
description: Public access block settings are completely disabled, allowing potential unauthorized access to sensitive medical records
evidence:
block_public_acls = false
block_public_policy = false
ignore_public_acls = false
restrict_public_buckets = false
reasoning: All public access controls are set to false, meaning the S3 bucket can be publicly accessed, exposing sensitive PHI data

title: Missing Encryption for Sensitive Medical Data
description: No explicit encryption configuration for S3 bucket storing PHI data
reasoning: PHI data requires encryption at rest to protect sensitive medical information

title: Logging Not Configured for PHI Data Bucket
description: No logging configuration for tracking access to sensitive medical records
reasoning: Lack of logging prevents audit trail and monitoring of data access
